code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Nav from'./Nav';import useFetchUser from'./useFetchUser';import axios from'axios';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ViewBoard(){const{user}=useFetchUser();const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const no={...location.state};const[view,setView]=useState([]);const[isLiked,setIsLiked]=useState(false);const liked=async()=>{try{if(user){const response=await axios.post('/postdb/liked',{post_no:no.no},{withCredentials:true});if(response.data.success){setView(prevView=>({...prevView,liked:isLiked?prevView.liked-1:prevView.liked+1}));setIsLiked(prev=>!prev);}else{alert('로그인을 해주세요.');navigate('/login',{state:{form:location.pathname}});return;}}}catch(error){console.error(error);}};useEffect(()=>{const viewData=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('/postdb/view',{no:no.no});const data=response.data;setView(data);setIsLiked(data.liked>0);}catch(error){console.error(error);}};viewData();},[no.no]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("body",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:view.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:view.writer})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:view.content})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:view.regDate})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:view.hits})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:view.liked}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:liked,children:isLiked?'좋아요 취소':'좋아요'})]});}export default ViewBoard;
